dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Dr. Flavio, are you crazy?>Why did you try to attack me?

dialogs.name: DR. FLÁVIO
dialogs.sentenses: Dammit! You were supposed to be burned with all that damn forest!

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Why? You've been this town's doctor for years, not only my family but everyone here trusted you!

dialogs.name: DR. FLÁVIO
dialogs.sentenses: Because I wanted to wake her up!

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Wake her up? Wait, who are you?

dialogs.name: DR. FLÁVIO
dialogs.sentenses: Since you're about to die when I'm done here, I'll let you know my real name is Tom Wasser.

dialogs.name: TOM WASSER
dialogs.sentenses: For years I have been investigating unreality and a way to bring it out, to interact with some being that is from the old stories. I wanted something to be real, but I was never successful.

dialogs.name: TOM WASSER
dialogs.sentenses: Until I ended up in this end of the world, and my greatest misfortune became my greatest luck.

dialogs.name: TOM WASSER
dialogs.sentenses: Taking care of patients here, I noticed that they always had good dreams and full of riches.> And I realized later that the waters of this place were different and I studied them.

dialogs.name: TOM WASSER
dialogs.sentenses: And after a lot of experimentation I discovered how to activate them with the natural crystals of this place and I was able to see it in my own dreams.

dialogs.name: TOM WASSER
dialogs.sentenses: And now I want to see it with my own eyes and for that you have to sacrifice yourself. So that my dream, the dream of all humanity, becomes real.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: You sick freak! The only one who will die here is you!
